title: Relates to state policy regarding the preservation of the unique qualities of the nighttime sky
summary: Relates to state policy regarding the preservation of the unique qualities of the nighttime sky.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1846

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 12, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. ROSENTHAL, GOTTFRIED, GALEF, DINOWITZ, LUPARDO,
         CAHILL -- Multi-Sponsored by --  M.  of  A.  BOYLAND,  BRENNAN,  COOK,
         GABRYSZAK,  GLICK, HOOPER, MAYERSOHN, McENENY, ORTIZ, PAULIN, SWEENEY,
         WEINSTEIN -- read once and referred to the Committee on  Environmental
         Conservation

       AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to stat-
         ing  policy  relating to preserving the unique qualities of the night-
         time sky

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Subdivision  3  of  section  1-0101  of the environmental
    2  conservation law is amended to read as follows:
    3    3. It shall further be the policy of the  state  to  foster,  promote,
    4  create  and maintain conditions under which man and nature can thrive in
    5  harmony with each other, and achieve social, economic and  technological
    6  progress for present and future generations by:
    7    a. Assuring surroundings INCLUDING THE NIGHTTIME SKY which are health-
    8  ful and aesthetically pleasing;
    9    b.  Guaranteeing that the widest range of beneficial uses of the envi-
   10  ronment is attained without risk to health or safety, unnecessary degra-
   11  dation or other undesirable or unintended   consequences;
   12    c. Promoting patterns of development  and  technology  which  minimize
   13  adverse impact on the environment;
   14    d.  Preserving  the  unique  qualities  INCLUDING THE NIGHTTIME SKY of
   15  special resources such as the Adirondack and Catskill  forest  preserves
   16  AND OF STATE PARKS, FARMS AND FORESTED LAND AND OTHER OPEN SPACE;
   17    e. Providing that care is taken for the air, water and other resources
   18  that  are  shared  with  the  other states of the United States and with
   19  Canada in the manner of a good neighbor.
   20    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02247-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to stating policy relating to preserving the unique qualities of the nighttime sky
